alert.note: Alert for Blair; Cambria; Clearfield (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 01 at 9:56AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CLEARFIELD...BLAIR...AND CAMBRIA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of moderate to heavy snow may produce a quick coating of snow, accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 955 AM EDT, a band of briefly moderate to heavy snow was along a line extending from near Clearfield to 20 miles west of Tyrone to 17 miles north of Ebensburg and moving southeast at 30 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Prince Gallitzin State Park and Hastings around 1000 AM EDT. Patton around 1005 AM EDT. Blandburg around 1010 AM EDT. Bellwood around 1025 AM EDT. Altoona and Tipton around 1030 AM EDT. This includes Route 219 from near Cherry Tree to Burnside. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
